demoInfo.name: Weekly Heatmap
summary: This chart is a grid of days and hours using a quantile to group the data values by nine colors. The number of groups is directly tied to the colors array, so removing or adding colors to the array also affects the number of groups.

meta.description: Heatmap chart example using D3.js, very similar to the one displayed in the GitHub site, with a few additions from the original.
